participant_1.background:
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I spent the year creating a series of paintings inspired by my favorite childhood books.
i go to at least 10 concerts a year.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.

participant_2.background:
I just finished talking to my father about his career as a cop.
My weight is healthy and I am happy with it.
I have a job that allows me to work from home so I can spend more time with my family.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest to learn more about the native people and their way of life.
My relationships are the most valuable thing I own because they are a source of joy and support.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing well too, thanks! I'm just getting ready for a move.
Oh, exciting! Where are you moving to?
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
That sounds awesome! I love antique stores.
Me too! I'm looking forward to spending more time browsing them.
I'm sure you'll find some great treasures.
I hope so! I'm also looking forward to seeing more live music.
That's always a good time. What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite is 80s rock.
Nice! I like some 80s rock too.
Awesome! Maybe we can go to a concert together sometime.
